import Upgrades from "./Upgrades" class HelperShop extends React.Component() { constructor(props) { super(props) props.incrementDps = this.incrementDps props.totalMoney = this.totalMoney props.updateMoney = this.updateMoney } purchaseHelper(cost, dps) { console.log(totalMoney,cost) if(totalMoney-cost<0) return updateMoney(cost*-1) incrementDps(dps) } render() {

Helper Shop

purchaseHelper(cost, dps)} /> this.handleLuckUpgrade(cost)} /> this.handleMoneyCountUpgrade(cost)} />
} } export default HelperShop
